text:
Hi All, how do i use alias mapping to map content from one field repeater to the other, my current format looks as follows
• Cards (cards) [repeater]
    ◦ Card Link (card_link)
    ◦ Heading (heading)
    ◦ Paragraph (paragraph)
and my new format looks as followed
• Content (content) [Group]
    ◦ Cards (cards) [repeater]
        ▪︎ Card Link (card_link)
        ▪︎ Heading (heading)
        ▪︎ Paragraph (paragraph)
Basically i just need to map the already filled content from the original repeater to the grouped repeater. i thought it was as simple as placing the following in my new cards repeater (as it was this simple with non-repeating fields)
```"aliases_mapping": {
            "property_aliases_paths": {
                "cards": ["cards"]
            }
          }```
but this leaves my card repeater empty so far. please advise :pray:

Hi all fellow developers! :wave:
Is there a limit to which HubSpot decides whether to minimize CSS file or not?
I attach HubSpot-base stylesheet the very same way as my custom stylesheets (in general settings CSS & Stylesheets section) and it only minimizes HubSpot-base-v2.css. My custom stylesheet has above 7 000 lines of code :slightly_smiling_face:

Hello everyone, Can anyone have implemented SMS Integration with HubSpot? Can we reply to the SMS number from HubSpot using integration channel ?
I am looking for more functionalities(chat like) in SMS integration within HubSpot apart from just SMS Synchronization.
This is about a year old but maybe it will help - I have this on my todo list as well sometime soon...  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/intro-to-react-for-HubSpot-developers>

Hello, does anyone have experience firing HubSpot form submission into Facebook as Events using GTM? More specifically however being able to send parameters from HubSpot into Facebook to help improve the <https://www.facebook.com/business/help/765081237991954?id=818859032317965|Event Match Quality>, such as name, email address etc?
Hello everyone, Does anyone know if it’s possible to develop a CRM card using a Pro account, or is it only possible with an Enterprise account?
If you're building for a single HubSpot portal and developing a CRM UI Extension card, the portal needs to have either Sales Hub Enterprise or Service Hub Enterprise
The main rationale for this packaging is that these Enterprise hubs are geared towards the more advanced needs of sales and service teams working on CRM records to do their jobs

Hello everyone!
I am building out a site for a client who already has an enterprise account with HubSpot and uses wordpress plugin for a web form submissions.
The new site is on Drupal 10 and for starters I would like to get a sample basic form working and being able to get emails to HubSpot crm under marketing forms but struggling to accomplish so.
Finding various resources. Setup developer test account and setup drupal webform module and HubSpot module but not sure how to link webform from HubSpot to my drupal webform..
Help would be greatly appreciated!
Thank you for your response; I needed that information.:+1:
Hi team, do you know if it's possible to create a custom facebook api event? if yes, how can we create them?

Hey <@U07EJ0R1QDR>,
why not just creating a HS form and embed it on a drupal page?

Also I'm wondering why the client has enterprise and a website on drupal... Wouldn't it make more sense to migrate the page to HS, so everything is in one place?
Second part Im not sure on, but first part I thought about and might try going that route! thanks for feedback
<@UJAPS2K4N> is there flexibility to fully customize the layout of the form for embed? If I wanted to have flexbox 2 columns for example and custom box for entry at the bottom?
I only see basic css and colors type thing in the embed option..
Interesting, thanks for letting me know!
<@UJAPS2K4N> do you mind pointing me towards the dnd editor I dont seem to find the layout management option..

Marketing -> Forms -> Create new form (top right)

To add multi column, just drag and drop elements from the left sidebar to the right sidebar at the position you'd like to have it
HA I just figured it out too with the drag, thanks for details!

Hello everyone!

I am working with a client who is actively using the Wildjar - HubSpot connector and the connector doesn't pull through the ad attribution data when automatically creating HubSpot contacts. As a result the main value of using Wildjar & HubSpot together (attribute revenue to measure and report on the success of all ads) is not being realised. I came across <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Inbound-Calls-Attribution-Tracking/idi-p/962306|this great post> on the community which confirms that this is how the current implementation works and that they were not able to find good workarounds. Curious if anyone else in the community solved this problem before or found a working alternative to Wildjar.

You're welcome... btw - here's an old doc for embed code modification options:
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>
Thanks <@U01GW2U4WMA> :raised_hands:
